# Î¼Type [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/dfcreative/mutype.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/dfcreative/mutype) [![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/dfcreative/mutype/badges/gpa.svg)](https://codeclimate.com/github/dfcreative/mutype) <a href="UNLICENSE"><img src="http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/62/PD-icon.svg" width="20"/></a>

Modest library for checking types.

* `isObject`
* `isFn`
* `isString`
* `isNumber`
* `isBoolean`
* `isPlain`
* `isArray`
* `isArrayLike`
* `isElement`
* `isPrivateName`
* `isRegExp`

[![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/mutype.png?downloads=true&downloadRank=true&stars=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/mutype/)
